```{r child_gene_sets1, context="server"}
output$gene_sets1 <- renderDataTable({
	go <- igo()
	syms <- isolate(isym1())
	syms10 <- isym10()

	if(syms=="")return(NULL)
	eids <- df$eid[grep(paste0("^",syms),df$sym,ignore.case=T)]

	dt <- df %>% filter(eid %in% eids) %>%
		select(eid, sym, efficacy, selectivity) %>%
		`colnames<-`(c("gene.id","symbol","eff","sel")) %>%
		arrange(eff,desc(sel))

	ind <- which(dt$symbol==syms10)

	dt <- dt %>%
		datatable(extensions = 'Scroller', 
			options = list(
　　			  rowReorder = TRUE,
			  deferRender = TRUE,
			  scrollY = 1000,
			  pageLength=200,
			  scroller = TRUE,
			  order = list(list(3, 'asc'), list(4, 'desc'))),
			selection=list(mode="single", selected=ind,target="row"),
			editable=FALSE)
	return(dt)
})
```

dataTableOutput("gene_sets1")
